    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_3a551572601e3540b29fc6ebd919e4ab7d67e3bf</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sunrise and sunset at the poles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonnenaufgang und Sonnenuntergang an den Pfosten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lever de soleil et coucher du soleil aux poteaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sunrise e por do sol nos pólos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alba e tramonto ai pali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανατολή και ηλιοβασίλεμα στους πόλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Salida del sol y puesta del sol en los postes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows why at certain times the Sun never rises or sets at the North Pole or South pole.  The dark shade indicates night.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth's rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt warum zu bestimmten Zeiten 
die Anstiege oder die Sets der Sonne nie am Nordpol oder am Südpol. 
Der dunkle Farbton zeigt Nacht an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre pourquoi par moments les 
élévations ou les positionnements du soleil jamais au Polonais 
du nord ou au poteau du sud. La nuance foncée indique la
nuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra porque por vezes as 
ascensões ou os jogos do sol nunca no pólo norte ou no pólo sul. 
A máscara escura indica a noite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra perchè a certi momenti gli 
aumenti o gli insiemi del sole mai al palo del nord o al palo del sud.
La tonalità scura indica la notte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει γιατί σε ορισμένους 
χρόνους ο ήλιος δεν αυξάνεται ποτέ ή θέτει στο βόρειο πόλο ή 
το νότιο πόλο. Η σκοτεινή σκιά δείχνει τη νύχτα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra porqué a veces las subidas
o los conjuntos del sol nunca en el Polo Norte o el poste del sur. 
La cortina oscura indica noche.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nordpol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südpol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la rotation de la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pôle du nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poteau du sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le soleil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rotação da terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólo norte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólo sul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotazione della terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palo del nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palo del sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γήινη περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βόρειος πόλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νότιος πόλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήλιος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rotación de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Polo Norte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">poste del sur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sol</string>
          </keyword>
